title: Quick and easy vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, roughly diced', '1 stick celery, roughly diced', '1 medium carrot, roughly diced', '1 medium parsnip, roughly diced', '1 medium potato, roughly diced', '1 small green pepper, roughly diced', '1 litre vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
